channel.title: Changqian Yu
channel.description: {"en"=>"This is an academic website for Changqian Yu to share his experiences, projects, publications and tech/non-tech posts. Changqian Yu is a Ph.D. student at Huazhong University of Science and Technology(HUST), working with Prof. Nong Sang. His research interests focus on the field of Deep Learning and Computer Vision, particularly in the topic of semantic segmentation. ", "cn"=>"这是余昌黔的个人学术主页，用于分享他的个人经历，项目，学术论文，技术相关/不相关的博客。"}
